text: sir nenu ABC Finance nundi call chestunna, mee gold loan EMI gurinchi maatladali
sir today due date, please before 7 pm payment chestaru ante problem undadu
sir already three times reminder icham, next month nundi penalty interest pedataru
bro emi cheyadam ledu, daily call chestham appudu malli complaint anukuntaara?
comment: slightly rude tone but not harassment yet

text: inka ila delay chesthe company people home ki ochi matladali antey
mee neighbours mundu scene create avvakunda ippude clear cheyandi
hello madam, nenu collections team nundi, last month EMI miss ayyindi kabatti call chestunna
madam otp cheppandi, nenu phone lo payment complete chestha
otp evaritho share cheyyakudadhu ani message ochindi kada, alanti request cheyyadam tappu
comment: this one is actually correct education (non-offensive)

text: inka emi excuse matladakunda today ne payment cheyyali, leka pothe nenu police complaint pettestha
court case padithe jail kosam ready undali, naa degara recording undi
sir tension padakandi, emi ayina nenu explain chestha, installment plan petti slow ga clear cheyyachu
meeru ippudu pay cheyyalekapothe ok, kani talk rude ga cheyyakandi please
nee mind lo emi undaado telidu kani idi loan, nee daddy pocket money kaadu
inkoka sari emi gattiga maatladithe call cut chesi block chestham, malli loan dorakadu
ra bhayya emi comedy chesthunav, emi EMI ante chesina chatti ledu
nee amma lanja kodaka emi loan tiskoni emi danger create chesav
sir app lo amount and due date clear ga chupistundi, memu formal ga remind chesthunna
call disturb ayite sorry, mi convenient time cheppandi schedule chestha
meeru naku phone cut chesthe nenu mee office ki directly vastha, andar mundu cheptha
sare sir, nenu aggressive ayyaanu, sorry, mana madhya matladukundam
night 10 clock varaku call chestha, emi rule undi ante cheppu
idhe style lo matladithe nenu meeku dorakakunda chestha future loan
